title: Publications
text:
Selected Publications

J. Ye, W. Xuan, Q. Guo, Y. Liu, B. Wang, X. Zhang and H. H. C. Iu, “An overview of reinforcement learning for power electronic converters: Topology derivation, parameter design, and control implementation,” Renewable and Sustainable Energy Reviews, vol. 228, Mar. 2026. -Link-
J. Ye, H. Guo, B. Wang and X. Zhang, “Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient Algorithm Based Reinforcement Learning Controller for Single-Inductor Multiple-Output DC–DC Converter,” IEEE Transactions on Power Electronics, vol. 39, no. 4, pp. 4078-4090, Apr. 2024. -Link-
J. Ye, H. Guo, D. Zhao, B. Wang and X. Zhang, “TD3 Algorithm Based Reinforcement Learning Control for Multiple-Input Multiple-Output DC–DC Converters,” IEEE Transactions on Power Electronics, vol. 39, no. 10, pp. 12729-12742, Oct. 2024. -Link-
J. Ye et al., “Improving Voltage Regulation of Interleaved DC–DC Boost Converter via Soft Actor–Critic Algorithm-Based Reinforcement Learning Controller,” IEEE Journal of Emerging and Selected Topics in Power Electronics, vol. 13, no. 5, pp. 5958-5969, Oct. 2025.
J. Ye et al., “Soft Actor-Critic Algorithm Based Reinforcement Learning Controller for Single-Inductor Dual-Output DC-DC Converter,” IEEE Journal of Emerging and Selected Topics in Industrial Electronics, vol. 6, no. 4, pp. 1478-1490, Oct. 2025.
J. Ye, H. B. Gooi and F. Wu, “Optimization of the Size of UPQC System Based on Data-Driven Control Design,” IEEE Transactions on Smart Grid, vol. 9, no. 4, pp. 2999-3008, Jul. 2018.
J. Ye, H. B. Gooi and F. Wu, “Optimal Design and Control Implementation of UPQC Based on Variable Phase Angle Control Method,” IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics, vol. 14, no. 7, pp. 3109-3123, Jul. 2018.
J. Ye, H. B. Gooi, B. Wang and X. Zhang, “A New Flexible Power Quality Conditioner With Model Predictive Control,” IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics, vol. 15, no. 5, pp. 2569-2579, May 2019.
J. Ye and H. B. Gooi, “Phase Angle Control Based Three-phase DVR with Power Factor Correction at Point of Common Coupling,” Journal of Modern Power Systems and Clean Energy, vol. 8, no. 1, pp. 179-186, Jan. 2020.
J. Ye, H. B. Gooi, X. Zhang and H. H. C. Iu, “Simplified Four-Level Inverter-Based Single-Phase DSTATCOM Using Model Predictive Control,” IEEE Journal of Emerging and Selected Topics in Power Electronics, vol. 8, no. 4, pp. 3382-3395, Dec. 2020.

title: 中文简历
text:
叶剑，男，IEEE高级会员，2012年毕业于中国武汉大学电气工程与自动化专业，2013年和2018年分别毕业于新加坡南洋理工大学电气工程专业，获电气工程硕士和博士学位。他目前是哈尔滨工业大学（深圳）的副研究员。他的研究兴趣包括电力电子和微电网的智能控制。

邮箱：yejian007@126.com
电话：

title: Jian Ye（叶剑）
text:
jye007@126.com
  
  
    
     Google Scholar
  
  
    
     ORCID
  

  
  

Jian Ye (Senior Member, IEEE) received the B.Eng. degree in electrical engineering and automation from Wuhan University, Wuhan, China, in 2012, and the M.Sc. and Ph.D. degrees in electrical engineering from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, in 2013 and 2018, respectively. He is currently a Technical Director and Professor of Engineering at China Southern Power Grid (CSG) in Guangzhou, China. His research interests include intelligent control for power electronics and microgrids.



2026 - Present：Technical Director, Professor of Engineering, China Southern Power Grid (CSG)
2019-2025: Assistant Professor/Associate Researcher, Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen (HITSZ)
2018-2019：Research Fellow，Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N)
2014-2018: Ph.D. in Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, specializing in Electrical Engineering
2012-2013: M.Sc. in Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, specializing in Electrical Engineering
2008-2012: Bachelor of Engineering, Wuhan University, China, majoring in Electrical Engineering
